problems.title: 2D Array Sum
problems.description: Calculate the sum of all elements in a 2D array.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: rows and columns (r c)
Next r lines: c space-separated integers each
problems.outputFormat: Print the sum of all elements

problems.title: Row Sum
problems.description: Print the sum of each row in the 2D array.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: rows and columns (r c)
Next r lines: c space-separated integers each
problems.outputFormat: Print r lines, each containing the sum of that row

problems.title: Column Sum
problems.description: Print the sum of each column in the 2D array.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: rows and columns (r c)
Next r lines: c space-separated integers each

problems.title: Diagonal Sum
problems.description: Calculate the sum of main diagonal elements (for square matrix).
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (matrix size)
Next n lines: n space-separated integers each
problems.outputFormat: Print the sum of diagonal elements

problems.title: Transpose Matrix
problems.description: Print the transpose of the matrix.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: rows and columns (r c)
Next r lines: c space-separated integers each
problems.outputFormat: Print the transposed matrix (c rows, r columns)
